Text: Re Annual Christmas Dinner Cc Girls Dinner on the nd sounds good to me I cant wait to see all of you Susan wrote i am truly up for either of the suggestions emily made i just dont want to go some place that we have already been for this particular excursion Emily Hillegeist on AM To Corinne ellcom tageStorescom cc Subject Re Annual Christmas Dinner my vote is for the nd there is a good chance that if we were to plan this business on the th we would need to bring a cot for me since approx pm will still be feeling like waaaaay past my bedtime and NO ONE wants me to be subdued do they ok dont answer that who else will take it upon themselves to be embarassingly drunk perhaps vomiting on the curbexcept laura oh wait thats the trash can just kidding laura couldnt resist plus it was nice to have a partner in crimejen kk other spectacular vomiters you are included as well you nonhangover happygolucky at am people make me sickliterally god am i rambling a little loopy too many papers too little time i was also going to throw out las alamedas as a suggestion or ousiess table any thoughts i dont think ANY of us have been there for grp thingscant wait to see everyone e From Laura Jahnke ReplyTo To Susan Edwards Ash Mace Katy Hester Emily Hillegeist Corinne ellcom Laura White indspring Subject Annual Christmas Dinner Date Fri Dec Hi Girls Its that time again We need to get everyone together for our annual Christmas Dinner I have spoken to many of you and tried to come up with a good time for everyone Unfortunately there doesnt seem to be a perfect day but how about FridayDec nd Please respond and tell me what you think I have had a few suggestions for a placeChurrascos Americas Ruggles Benjis Sullivansplease send a suggestion Dont say it doesnt matter because majority vote will win and there will be no recount The time will probably be around pm I know the nd is close to Christmas so the th has also been suggestedbut I am afraid not everyone will be in town yet Please send me your thoughts on the day restauraunt and if we should plan something after dinner I cant wait to see everyone and hope all can make it Laura Get more from the Web FREE MSN Wedding DetailsHi Girls Ill be Mrs Susan Williams in DAYS Im so excited and nervous and stressed all at the same time This has been a hectic week not only with wedding errands but also trying to get my life wrapped up before I take off for three weeks Before I leave town I want to make sure you all know whats going on next weekend I think most of you with the exception of Katie will be getting in town on Friday If anyone will be in Park City by am on Friday Id love for you to come to the bridal luncheon my grandmother is having for me If you can make it let me know Friday night Ive got the rehearsal at the church at The rehearsal dinner starts at pm at the Marriot Dinner will be very casual You may want to wear or bring something with long sleeves because dinner is outside and it gets chilly at night low s in Park City After dinner it will be time to ditch the families and head to Main Street where we will have our choice of two or three bars all very laid back holeinthewall type places On Saturday morning I would like to have breakfast with all of you I want to spend some qualit y time with you before the day gets hectic The location is tobeannounced Ill scope out a good breakfast place when I get to Park City Unfortunately well have to eat early around am so if any of you have to much fun on Friday night Ill know why you arent there The wedding will be at pm The church is on Main Street at the top of the hill The parking situation is kind of confusing because you cant park on Main Street and the parking lot is on the street that runs behind the church You may want to check the church out ahead of time so you know where it is The ceremony will be approx hour The reception is at Stein Eriksen Lodge which is up the mountain a few miles It doesnt start until which gives you some time to kill between the wedding and reception This will give Eric and I time to take pictures at the church wi thout having to miss any of the reception I figure by the time you freshen up drive up to Stein Eriksen which is a beautiful drive up the mountain and you can have a drink at the bar it will be five oclock After the reception you are on your own Now my requestCan everyone let me know when they are getting into town and where they are staying Ive got that information for most of you but I just want to verify Also Kelly and Laura if your husbands want to play golf on Friday morning with Eric and his friends let me know FYI If anyone wants to treat themselves to a messagemanicurepedicureetc while in Park City the number for the Belle Salon is My mom and I leaving on Monday If any of you want to get in touch with me my cell phone is the best place to reach me I cant wait to see all of you next weekend Im so excited that all of you are coming to the wedding Each of you is very special to me and it means so much to have you there on my wedding day Love Susan Do You Yahoo Make international calls for as low as minute with Yahoo Messenger
